content.rendered:
Condolence messages on the passing away of Dr. S.S Mohapatra by Distinguished persons

(former member of Parliament, Loksabha and Rajyasabha )

A.P.J Abdul Kalam (President of India)

Manmohan Singh (Prime minister of India)

Rameshwar Thakur (Governor of Odisha)

Naveen Patnaik (Chief Minister of Odisha)

Sheila Dikshit (Former Chief minister of Delhi)

V.P Singh (Former Prime mister)

Chandra Shekhar (Former Prime minister, India)

Sonia Gandhi (President AICC and Member of Parlimant)

S.M Krishna (Governor, Maharshtra)

P.C Alexander (governor  of maharashtra )

SK Singh (Governor, Arunachal Pradesh)

R.L Bhatia (Governor of Kerala)

B.L Joshi(lieutenant governor)

Lalit Mansingh (Former ambassador to United States)

P.D.T Achary (Secretary general, Loksabha)

Yogendra Narayan (Secretary general, Rajyasabha)

V. Narayanswamy (M.P and general secretary, All India congress committee)

Ashok ghelot (Chief minister and General Secretary, All India Congress Committee)

Kamal Nath (Minister of Commerce, India)

Ahmed Patel (All India Congress Committee)

A.K Antony (Member of Parliament)

Ashwini Kumar Vaishnav (IAS, Secretary to Atal Bihari Valpayee, Former P.M)

V.V Swaminathan (Former member of Parliament and minister)

Mark Runacres (Deputy high commissioner, British High commission)

Salman Khurshid (Former union Minister)

S.k Mediratta (Organizing Secretary, Dadahai Naoroji international society)

Prof. H.R Dase Gowda (Secretary Gandhi Bhaban)

Shiv Charan Gupta (Former member Of Parliament)

Swaraj Paul (Member house of Lord, London )

Meira Kumar (Minister of Social justice, india)

Park Sang-Seek (Rector  Kyung HEE University, Seoul, South korea)

A.C Peter (President Indo- Israel Friendship Association)

S.K Tamotia (Director of Vedant Resources, London )

Sudhir Raha (Chairman and Managing Director ONGC)

Arun Mehta (Chairman and Managing director Varun Shipping Company)

Mohan Lal Tulsian (Former Member of Parliament)

Sadhan C. Dutt (Chairman Development constant group of companies )

N.F Tankariwala (Chairman The Moran Tea Company)

R.P Billimoria (Former member of Parliament)

Roda B. Billmoria

Saifuddin Soz (Water resources minister)

Jugal Kishor Patnaik (Former Minister)

Farrokh Rustomji (Parsi Anjuman, Mumbai )

G Sagar Suri (Noted Statesman)

Rama Chandra Khuntia (Member of Parliament )

Prasad Harichandan (MLA, Odisha)

Dr. Dinanath Pathi (Noted Painter)

Hemalata Das (Secretary , BDNS)

Karan Singh (Member of Parliament)

Shree Brajanath Ratha (Member of Sahitya academy, Delhi)

AND MANY MORE...
